FinishedForTheDay.text: Your answers are saved for the research team while you're working. See the project stats and return to the {{projectName}} home page.
FinishedForTheDay.title: Finished for the day?

RecentSubjects.text: Discuss a subject on Talk, or add it to your Favourites or a collection.

WorkflowAssignmentModal.confirm: Take me to the next workflow!
WorkflowAssignmentModal.content: Congratulations! Because you're doing so well, you can now access another workflow. If you prefer to stay with the current workflow, you can choose to stay.
WorkflowAssignmentModal.dismiss: Don't show this again this session
WorkflowAssignmentModal.title: New Workflow Available
